en.input_description: Entering content via the mouse or keyboard, is the packaging of the most basic form fields.
en.second_input_description: Can post some content, use addonAfter property
en.textarea_description: Text field input box for multi-line input
en.group_input_description: Combination of select and input box
en.pls_enter_a_valid_email_address: Please enter a valid email address
en.third_input_description: Can add a variety of verification rules

zh-CN.input_description: 通过鼠标或键盘输入内容，是最基础的表单域的包装
zh-CN.second_input_description: 可以后置一些内容，使用 addonAfter 属性
zh-CN.textarea_description: 文本域输入框，用于多行输入
zh-CN.search_input_description: 带有搜索按钮的输入框
zh-CN.group_input_description: 选择器和输入框的组合
zh-CN.pls_enter_a_valid_email_address: 请输入一个合法的 email 地址
zh-CN.third_input_description: 可以添加各种各样的校验规则
